User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the SmartLearn AI platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.
Unique identifier for the topic entity.

createdBy.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Topic) The ID of the user who created the topic.

roadmapIds.description: References to Roadmaps. (Relationship: Topic 1:N Roadmap) List of roadmap IDs associated with this topic.

Roadmap.title: Roadmap
Roadmap.description: Represents a learning roadmap for a topic, consisting of multiple steps.

id.description: Unique identifier for the roadmap entity.

topicId.description: Reference to Topic. (Relationship: Topic 1:N Roadmap) The ID of the topic this roadmap belongs to.

stepNumber.description: The order number of this step in the roadmap.

stepTitle.description: The title of this step in the roadmap.

description.description: A description of what the step covers.

lessonIds.description: References to Lessons. (Relationship: Roadmap 1:N Lesson) List of lesson IDs associated with this roadmap step.

Lesson.title: Lesson
Lesson.description: Represents a single lesson within a roadmap step.

id.description: Unique identifier for the lesson entity.

roadmapId.description: Reference to Roadmap. (Relationship: Roadmap 1:N Lesson) The ID of the roadmap step this lesson belongs to.

description.description: A detailed description of the lesson content.

youtubeLink.description: Link to a YouTube video associated with the lesson.

status.description: The status of the lesson (To Learn, Learning, Learned).

testId.description: Reference to Test. (Relationship: Lesson 1:1 Test) The ID of the test associated with this lesson.

Test.title: Test
Test.description: Represents a test/quiz associated with a lesson.

id.description: Unique identifier for the test entity.

lessonId.description: Reference to Lesson. (Relationship: Lesson 1:1 Test) The ID of the lesson this test belongs to.

questions.description: An array of question objects for the test.

DailyTask.title: DailyTask
DailyTask.description: Represents a daily learning task assigned to a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the daily task entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N DailyTask) The ID of the user assigned the task.

topicId.description: Reference to Topic. (Relationship: Topic 1:N DailyTask) The ID of the topic the task belongs to.

lessonId.description: Reference to Lesson. (Relationship: Lesson 1:N DailyTask) The ID of the lesson associated with the task.

date.description: The date the task is assigned for.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support the SmartLearn AI platform, emphasizing authorization independence, clear data ownership, and efficient querying.  Authorization Independence is achieved via path-based ownership for user-specific data and the denormalization of the 'createdBy' field from `Topic` into `Roadmap` and `Lesson` entities. This eliminates the need for `get()` calls in security rules, ensuring atomic operations. Segregation via path-based ownership (`/users/{userId}/dailyTasks/{dailyTaskId}`) also enhances security and optimizes `list` operations. User-generated content (topics, roadmaps, lessons, daily tasks) is organized under user-specific paths (`/users/{userId}/topics/{topicId}`, `/users/{userId}/roadmaps/{roadmapId}`, etc.) to enforce clear ownership. This facilitates secure `list` operations (QAPs) and simplifies security rules. Additionally, a dedicated `users` collection stores user profile information. The structure also enables the AI to store generated roadmaps, lessons, tasks and quizzes.
